EmailTemplate.subject: See you this Tuesday at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up this Tuesday in Atlanta. We look forward to seeing you!
Please be prepared to present a form of photo ID upon check-in with Security. Please also bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Tuesday, October 21, 2014 8:00am - 5:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/atlanta>
Cox Communications 6305 Peachtree Dunwoody Road, NE C-Tech Building: Jim Kennedy Conference Center, Azalea Room Atlanta, GA 30328 Map and Driving Directions <http://www.mapquest.com/us/georgia/business-atlanta/cox-enterprises-inc-288296417>
Parking Information The visitor’s parking garage is located on the Peachtree Dunwoody Road. Once inside the visitor’s parking garage, follow the signs to the 6305 A or B building. From level B2 or P1, take the elevator to the lobby (level 2L) of the C-Tech A or B building (the buildings are connected and share one security desk). Obtain a visitor badge from the security desk after presenting a photo ID. Security will direct you to wait in the seating area for an escort. Should you require assistance with directions, please call Cox Enterprises Security at 678-645-0911 <tel:678-645-0911>.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans) - The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
- A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io
QUESTIONS? Contact Kim Marie Ruquet at kruquet@pivotal.io <mailto:kruquet@pivotal.io> or via cell at 631-388-0569 <tel:631-388-0569>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
